sentences.english: The two-band British EQ is famous for its warm, musical sound.
sentences.chinese: 这两个波段均衡器，是英国的热情，著名的音乐声。

sentences.english: Based on the estimated parameters, zero-forcing equalizers with different delay can be developed.
sentences.chinese: 基于该参数可构造出不同时延的迫零均衡器。

sentences.english: Proprietary Equalizer for editing audio using specific frequency bands.
sentences.chinese: 采用特定频段编辑音频的专用均衡器。

sentences.english: An adaptive MLSE receiver based on per-survivor processing (PSP) for digital transmissions over high frequency (HF) channels is proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种适用于无线时变信道的逐幸存处理均衡器。

sentences.english: Audio graphic equalizers are implemented by filter banks.
sentences.chinese: 图示均衡器传统上由滤波器组实现。

sentences.english: As the music beats, the shirts equalizer lights up to the beat of the music.
sentences.chinese: 随着音乐的不同节拍，汗衫上的均衡器就会随之亮起。

sentences.english: This paper presents a computer program for delay equalizer automatic design.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一种时延均衡器的机助设计程序。

sentences.english: An unexpected benefit is that the pole shift will be a great equalizer.
sentences.chinese: 一个出人预料的好处在于极移将会是个很好的均衡器。

sentences.english: In the end, we expected the future development of dynamic gain equalizers.
sentences.chinese: 最后对未来动态增益均衡器的发展作了展望。

sentences.english: The cluster is fronted by a software HTTP load balancer.
sentences.chinese: 集群前端是一个软件HTTP负载均衡器。
内置3与低切滤波器频段均衡器。

sentences.english: In sets at 7 kind of timbres balancers, 7 colors back lights to demonstrate, Synchronized lyrics demonstration.
sentences.chinese: 内置7种音色均衡器，7彩背光显示，同步歌词显示。

sentences.english: The controller 36 performs the same process using the equalizer receiver 34.
sentences.chinese: 控制器36使用均衡器接收机34执行相同处理。

sentences.english: The first parameter is the name of the load balancer, which is unique to you.
sentences.chinese: 第一个参数是负载均衡器的名称，对您来说是惟一的。

sentences.english: FIG. 3 schematically shows an arrangement including a plurality of equalizers.
sentences.chinese: 图3示意性地表示了包括多个均衡器的布置。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
